alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:27PM CDT until July 18 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR DE KALB...CENTRAL COFFEE...VAN BUREN...WARREN...NORTHWESTERN GRUNDY...WHITE...PUTNAM AND CANNON COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Baxter to near Smithville to 12 miles north of Manchester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, McMinnville, Manchester, Sparta, Smithville, Woodbury, Spencer, Algood, Monterey, Gruetli-Laager, Baxter, Altamont, Alexandria, Coalmont, Morrison, Doyle, Beersheba Springs, Dowelltown, Liberty and Auburntown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 268 and 305. Interstate 24 between mile markers 97 and 113. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White
